I loved the style, but never wore it because I felt it looked dirty.
Wore with all black and looked like a superhero. Love it. Was a little tight in shoulders for me, but I have broader shoulders so that was understandable.

A beautiful piece that I got tons of compliments on. I'm 5'5" and needed a bit of a heel to keep it from dragging.

Dear lord, please let me keep this piece of heaven.
